mapper.select: SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0), POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID ORDER BY POST.CREATION_DATE DESC

SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0), POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID WHERE POST.ID = #{id}

SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0), POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID WHERE POST.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CONTENTS, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, CLICK_CNT) VALUES(#{NAME}, #{CREATION_DATE}, #{MODIFIED_DATE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{BOARD_ID}, #{MEMBER_ID}, 0)
